title: Dreadknight Garen - NA
body:
I cant seem to get the code for dreadknight garen to work :(

{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Sorry for the trouble, but the juggernaut should be on your account now! :D
You could either [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and request the skin, or you can wait patiently for one of the poros to notice you and help you.
